link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
formula: G.f.: G(0)/(1-x), where G(k)= 1 - (2*k + 1)*x/( 1 - 2*x*(k+1)/(2*x*(k+1) - 1/G(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 24 2013
a(n) = exp(1)*Gamma(0,1) + (-1)^n*exp(1)*(n+1)!*Gamma(-n-1,1), where Gamma(a,x) is the upper incomplete Gamma function. - _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Oct 29 2015
